trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create a new notification hub to use for push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Follow these steps to create a new notification hub to use for push notifications.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a notification hub, you can also connect it to your Mobile App backend.
trans-unit.target: If you already have a notification hub, you can also connect it to your Mobile App backend.

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure Portal], click **Browse** > **App Services**, then click your Mobile App backend > **All settings**, then under **Mobile** click **Push** > **Notification Hub**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure Portal], click **Browse** > **App Services**, then click your Mobile App backend > **All settings**, then under **Mobile** click **Push** > **Notification Hub**.

trans-unit.source: Click **+Notification Hub**, type a new **Notification Hub** name, which can be the same as your Mobile App backend, type a new namespace name or use an existing one, then click **OK** and finally **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click **+Notification Hub**, type a new **Notification Hub** name, which can be the same as your Mobile App backend, type a new namespace name or use an existing one, then click **OK** and finally **Create**.

trans-unit.source: This creates a new notification hub and connects it to your mobile app.
trans-unit.target: This creates a new notification hub and connects it to your mobile app.

trans-unit.source: If you have an existing notification hub, you can choose to connect it to your Mobile App backend instead of creating a new one.
trans-unit.target: If you have an existing notification hub, you can choose to connect it to your Mobile App backend instead of creating a new one.

trans-unit.source: Now you have connected a notification hub to your Mobile App backend.
trans-unit.target: Now you have connected a notification hub to your Mobile App backend.

trans-unit.source: Later you will configure this notification hub to connect to a platform notification service (PNS) that sends push notifications to the native device.
trans-unit.target: Later you will configure this notification hub to connect to a platform notification service (PNS) that sends push notifications to the native device.
